subsections.heading: Introduction
subsections.content: The staff page provides an overview of all the staff members associated with the department. This section includes basic information such as names, emails, and performance data.

subsections.heading: Details
subsections.content: On the staff page you can: Search up staff members, Sort by the headings, Filter by area, Add target Hours, Edit or Remove Target Hours, View Instructor Reports

subsections.heading: Add Target Hours
subsections.content: To add target hours, you first need to select at least one staff member. Then navigate to the action dropdown where you can click the 'Add Target Hours' link. {{ staff-dropdown-img.staff-dropdown }} This will bring up a popup that will allow you to put the target hours. Note: Target hours should be no greater then 2000.

subsections.heading: Edit Target Hours
subsections.content: To edit target hours, you can click on the 'Edit mode' link from the drop down. This will make the target hours column editable. When done editing, click save. Note: Target hours should be no greater then 2000.

subsections.heading: Remove Target Hours
subsections.content: To remove target hours, you can click on the 'Edit mode' link from the drop down. Then leave the input fields blank for the staff members you want to remove the target hours and click save.

subsections.heading: Select Year
subsections.content: You can select the year you woukd like to view the insructor perfoamnce for by using the dropdown on the 'Target Hours' heading. Only years which have performanc data wil be shown.

subsections.heading: Completed Hours
subsections.content: You can view the completed hours for the selected month for each instructors. You can select which month you would like to view.

subsections.heading: Instructor Report
subsections.content: You can view the report of each instructor by clicking on the report icon in the report column. The report has information on the instructors courses, services roles and/or extra hours for the selected year. You can select a different year from the dropdown as along as a report for that year exists.

subsections.heading: Add new account
subsections.content: To add a new user account, you will need to click on the 'Add' button. A popup will be shown that will allow you to enter the user's full name, email and password. You may also select the roles for the user and then submit the form.

subsections.heading: Edit multiple accounts
subsections.content: To edit multiple accounts, you will need to click on the 'Edit' button. Then the roles and status fiel will become editable where you can toggle the neabled status and check or remove checks from the user's roles. When done, click 'Save'.

subsections.heading: Delete multiple accounts
subsections.content: To delete multiple, first select all the user accounts you would like to delete. Then click on the delete button which will bring a popup asking you to confirm. Once confirmed, the selected accounts will be deleted.

subsections.heading: Edit individual account
subsections.content: To edit an individual account, you can click on the edit icon on the user account you would like to edit. Then the roles and status field for that user will become editable. Once done, you can click on save icon to save.

subsections.heading: Delete individual account
subsections.content: To delete an individual account, you can click on the delete icon on the user account you would like to delete. Then a popup will appear, asking you to confirm. Once confirmed, the user account will be deleted.

subsections.heading: Send Reset Link
subsections.content: To send a reset link to a user account, click on the send rest link icon...
